item.title: CVE-2024-43329|2024-08-19T14:42:20.485Z -- wp%20chill -- allegiant
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Chill Allegiant allegiant allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Allegiant: from n/a through 1.2.7.
